sections.name: Gedovius
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Beast
traits.text: A creature similar to an animal but with an Intelligence modifier of –3 or higher is usually a beast. Unlike an animal, a beast might be able to speak and reason.

traits.name: Earth
traits.text:
Effects with the earth trait either manipulate or conjure earth. Those that manipulate earth have no effect in an area without earth. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of earth or have a connection to magical earth.  
  
These planes are mostly solid. Travelers arriving upon an earth plane risk suffocation if they don’t reach a cavern or some other air pocket within the plane’s solid matter. Creatures who can’t burrow are entombed in the plane’s substance and must attempt to dig their way toward an air pocket. Air creatures are ill at ease, as they rarely have the space to move freely through even the loftiest warrens.

reactive_abilities.name: Clawed Feet
reactive_abilities.trigger: The gargoyle is Flying, and a creature moves into an adjacent square below it.
reactive_abilities.effect: The gargoyle makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

ability.name: Dread Striker
ability.text: Any creature that has the frightened condition is also flat-footed against Gedovius's attacks.

ability.name: Intimidating Prowess
ability.text: Gedovius ignores the penalty for not sharing a language when he attempts to Demoralize a target.

ability.name: Rip and Rend
ability.requirement: Gedovius's last action was a melee Strike that dealt sneak attack damage to a flat-footed target.
ability.effect: Gedovius deals 6d6 persistent bleed damage to the target.

ability.name: Sneak Attack
ability.text: Gedovius deals 3d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

universal_monster_ability.name: Sneak Attack
universal_monster_ability.text: When the monster Strikes a creature that has the flat-footed condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.

ability.name: Statue

traits.name: Concentrate
traits.text: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

ability.text: Until the next time he acts, Gedovius appears to be a statue. He has an automatic result of 44 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as a statue.
